meanings.definition: Work a second job, typically at night, in addition to one's regular daytime job.
meanings.sent1: She is moonlighting as a waitress to earn extra money.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys moonlighting as a delivery driver on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The accountant was caught moonlighting as a magician at a birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The artist's true passion was moonlighting as a street performer.
meanings.sent5: Moonlighting as a tutor helped her save up for a vacation.

meanings.definition: Engage in an activity, especially a second job, in addition to one's regular employment.
meanings.sent1: They are moonlighting by selling handmade crafts online.
meanings.sent2: She has been moonlighting as a dog walker after her regular work hours.
meanings.sent3: The chef enjoys moonlighting as a food critic for fun.
meanings.sent4: The actor was caught moonlighting as a singer at a local bar.
meanings.sent5: Moonlighting as a photographer allows him to pursue his passion.
